item.description:
Learn, review and refresh basic communication skills of listening, "I" statements, and speaking clearly. Learn how to pick up cues from others, trust your intution, relax while speaking and practice putting words to your thoughts, feelings, and requests.

Cost is from $20-40. The traditional cost of my workshops have been $40 with a sliding scale. I have changed it from $20-40 but I don't turn anyone away. Pay the best you can, even if below $20. If you can afford more, it helps those who can't and helps me too!

Herb is a relationship coach of 30 years and has been teaching courses on communication skills for that long.

Herb Pearce
781 648 3737
www.herbpearce.com
www.Enneagramtraining.blogspot.com
item.name: Basic Skills of Communication
